title: Sacklers Raise Their Offer to Settle Opioid Lawsuits by More Than $1 Billion - The New York Times
content: Sacklers Raise Their Offer to Settle Opioid Lawsuits by More Than $1 Billion  The New York TimesView Full Coverage on Google News
description: But they continue to insist on protection from civil liability claims over opioids, an unusual and controversial measure that derailed a previous deal.
